title: The Myth of the Myth of the Lone Genius
author: Not specified in the provided text.
date_published: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: This article challenges the "myth of the lone genius," arguing that while breakthroughs may appear to come from solitary figures, they often involve significant collaboration and build upon prior work.  The article uses examples of historical figures like Einstein, Newton, and Darwin to illustrate the complexities of innovation and the limitations of a simplistic narrative.
